sentence.text: Taking advantage of the homogeneous and heterogeneous electrochemical biosensors, a positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, sensitive, and selective electrochemical biosensor is constructed by combining entropy-driven amplification (positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity) with DNA walker.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
